main event: A civilian passenger on a flight from Washington D.C. to Miami, Florida observed an unidentified object in the sky on August 8, 1963.
interesting points: The object was described as a long bar or strip, very red on the bottom and fading to yellow on the top.
The object was observed for approximately 40 minutes, remaining parallel to the aircraft and not changing its position relative to the aircraft.
The object disappeared as darkness fell.
The observers were unable to identify the object and thought it might be man-made.
The report indicates the description of the object requires further analysis.
sighted object: long, bar-shaped object with red and yellow coloring
witnesses: civilian passengers on a commercial flight
